name: Spaceship Crew Self-Defense Simulator
description:
GOAL:

Escape the prison facility. Luckily, there's a grenade launcher outside your unlocked cell.

KEYBINDINGS:

Movement:
Up = W
Down = S
Left = A
Right = D
Dash = Left shift (hold)

Combat:
Fire = Left mouse button
Reload = R

Inventory:
Select pistol = 1
Select shotgun = 2
Select machinegun = 3
Select grenade launcher = 4

Miscellaneous:
Respawn = H
Godmode = Q
See further = Left ctrl (hold)
Show FPS = B

Note:

Please leave some feedback or comments, it's greatly appreciated.
I'm looking for an artist if anyone is interested to collaborate.
